line.comment: * check if theres a new script version, and restart it
* check any drones to empty their wares
* check we have any ships to do the actual supply
* Drones should automatically repair the carrier if idle
* SUB: Repair carrier with own drones if not busy

sval.val: check if theres a new script version, and restart it
check any drones to empty their wares
check we have any ships to do the actual supply
Drones should automatically repair the carrier if idle
SUB: Repair carrier with own drones if not busy
